item.title: MongoDB Container
item.description: Creating MongoDB container docker commands Flags Description -d Running on deamon mode with acquisition of TTY -p Binding container port to host machine -v Mounting host path to container path –name Container name –restart Restart policy (always means automatic start when turning off) docker run -d -p 27017:27017 \ --restart always \ -v /Users/hackartist/data/docker/mongo/data:/data/db \ --name mongo mongo Management of MongoDB You can use GUI tools like Robo 3T or MongoDB compass.
